first.question: Sinun olisi tarkoitus hankkia vuokra-asunto, johon pääsisit muuttamaan parin kuukauden sisällä.
answers: Aloitat saman tien uuden vuokra-asunnon etsinnän netistä
Mahdolliseen muuttoon on vielä aikaa, joten hoidat vuokra-asunnon etsinnän myöhemmin

uusiAlku.question: Sinun pitäisi päästä muuttamaan mahdollisimman pian, etkä ole vielä edes aloittanut vuokra-asunnon etsintää.
answers: Aloitat saman tien uuden vuokra-asunnon etsinnän netistä
Et aio sittenkään muuttaa

etsinta.question: Olet löytänyt netistä verkkosivuja, joissa on mahdollisuus selata vapaana olevia vuokra-asuntoja.
answers: Asunnon etsintä vaikuttaa liian työläältä, joten hoidat sen myöhemmin
Etsit asuntoja, jotka näyttävät hyväkuntoisilta ja joihin sinulla on varaa
Etsit asuntoja, jotka näyttävät hyväkuntoisilta, mutta niiden vuokra on paljon suurempi, mihin sinulla on varaa

uusiEtsinta.question: Aikaa on kulunut, etkä ole vieläkään aloittanut vuokra-asunnon etsintää.
answers: Et aio sittenkään muuttaa, joten et etsi uutta asuntoa
Etsit asuntoja, jotka näyttävät hyväkuntoisilta ja joihin sinulla on varaa
Etsit asuntoja, jotka näyttävät hyväkuntoisilta, mutta niiden vuokra on paljon suurempi, mihin sinulla on varaa

selaus.question: Olet mielestäsi löytänyt useamman sopivan asunnon.
answers: Otat yhteyttä vain yhden asunnon vuokraajaan
Otat yhteyttä useampaan asunnon vuokraajaan, jotta mahdollisuutesi saada asunto on isompi

valmistautuminen.question: Sait sovittua asuntonäytön yhden asunnon vuokraajan kanssa.
answers: Mietit etukäteen jo valmiiksi kysymyksiä asunnosta ja menet ajoissa paikalle asuntonäyttöön
Menet ajoissa paikalle asuntonäyttöön
Menet tyylikkäästi myöhässä asuntonäyttöön

naytto.question: Saavuit asuntonäyttöön.
answers: Asunto ei mielestäsi olekaan niin hyvässä kunnossa kuin luulit, joten et aiokaan pyrkiä saamaan sitä asuntoa
Tarkastat asunnon kunnon ja kerrot asuntonäytön pitäjälle itsestäsi ja miksi olisit hyvä vuokralainen
Et tarkasta asunnon kuntoa ollenkaan, mutta kerrot kuitenkin asuntonäytön pitäjälle itsestäsi

uusiYritys.question: Asunto ei ollut hyväkuntoinen, joten etsit toisen asunnon, jonka asuntonäyttöön menet.
answers: Tarkastat asunnon kunnon ja kerrot asuntonäytön pitäjälle itsestäsi ja miksi olisit hyvä vuokralainen
Et tarkasta asunnon kuntoa ollenkaan, mutta kerrot kuitenkin asuntonäytön pitäjälle itsestäsi

asunnonSaanti.question: Vuokranantaja on vakuuttunut, että olisit hyvä vuokralainen ja tarjoaa vuokrasopimusta allekirjoitettavaksi.
answers: Tarkastat vuokrasopimuksen tarkkaan ennen allekirjoittamista
Vuokranantaja vaikuttaa luotettavalta, joten allekirjoitat sopimuksen lukematta sitä

sopimusLoppu.question: You have found yourself a new apartment and written a rental agreement for it. What do you do next?
answers: You make a notification of an address change
Nothing

ilmoitus.question: Where do you make the notification?
answers: To the post office
To Kela
You make a note on the bulletin board of your local market

posti.question: How do you inform the post about the change of your address?
answers: Through the postal websites
By going to the post office

sivusto.question: You have completed and submitted the notification of your address change. What next?
answers: You transfer your home insurance to the new home
You make an electricity contract for your new apartment
You notify your new address to the services you use
You inform the President about your new address

postikonttori.question: You go to the post office. What do you do?
answers: You ask the staff what you should do
You tell the staff that you want to fill in the change of address form
You play on your phone

tehty.question: You have now reported the change of your address. What next?
answers: You transfer your home insurance to the new home
You make an electricity contract for your new apartment
You notify your new address to the services you use
You inform the President about your new address

vakuutus.question: You need to get a home insurance for your new home. How do you handle this?
answers: You physically go to visit an insurance company's office
You call an insurance company
You complain on the internet about how hard everything is to handle

kaynti.question: You arrive at the insurance company's office. What do you do?
answers: You queue-jump before all the other clients
You wait for you turn and tell the clerk what you need

viha.question: You are asked to calm down and wait for your own turn.
answers: You obey, wait for your turn and tell the clerk what you need
You do not obey and leave berating everybody

ohi.question: You have now taken care of the matter. What do you do next?
answers: You make an electricity contract for your new apartment
You notify your new address to the services you use
You inform the President about your new address
You move

poissa.question: You did not get the matter done. What do you do next?
answers: You try again to get the home insurance
You make an electricity contract for your new apartment
You notify your new address to the services you use
You inform the President about your new address
You move

soitto.question: You call the insurance company and explain the matter. The clerk asks you a security question. What do you do?
answers: You answer the question so you can take care of the matter
You do not answer the question and close the call
You ask why the question is asked and answer it after you hear the explanation

kysytty.question: The clerk asks more details about your new apartment.
answers: You answer the questions politely
You complain to the clerk that she asks too much questions
You say that you don't have the needed information right now but you'll call again later

sahko.question: You want the electricity to work in your new apartment. What do you do?
answers: You use your neighbor's electricity
You call the electricity company
You fill out a form on the electricity company's website

soitasahko.question: You call the electricity company and explain the matter. The clerk asks you questions about your new apartment.
answers: You do not answer and switch off the phone
You answer the questions politely
You don't answer because you don't know the answers

kaavake.question: You go to the electricity company's website. They ask various questions about the new apartment.
answers: You provide all the information needed
You do not provide your information
You decide to call the electricity company instead

palvelut.question: You want to notify your new address to the services you use.
answers: You go through all your services and call them about your new address
You update the information on all the services' websites
You decide that services can have your old address

liittyma.question: Do you need a broadband internet connection to your new apartment?
answers: Yes
No

valinta.question: How do you get the broadband connection?
answers: You call the operator and explain the situation
You handle it online because you know how to do it
You try to handle it online even though you have no idea how to do it

selitykset.question: The clerk asks you about the new apartment and your needs for the subscription.
answers: You answer all the questions to the best of your ability
You refuse to answer and randomly just pick some subscription
You call another operator before making the decision

muutto.question: Once all the arrangements have been made, the only thing left is the moving itself. How do you take care of it?
answers: You order a moving service
You invite your acquaintances to help

muuttopalvelu.question: You call a moving service and they offer you their own suggestions regarding the moving process.
answers: You do not care about the advice and do as you want
You listen to their suggestions and decide which ones are right for you
You blindly obey their advice

muutetaanpalvelulla.question: Today is the moving day and you have already packed all your belongings. What do you do?
answers: You open the doors for the moving staff and let them take care of the moving process
You distract the moving staff all the time

tuttuauttaa.question: You call your acquaintances and agree with them on how to proceed with the moving process. What do you do?
answers: You do as you agreed
You do as you please

tuttupalvelu.question: You have prepared everything ready. Today is the moving day. How do you act?
answers: You move your belongings to the new apartment together with your acquaintances
You let your acquaintances move your stuff alone
You do as you agreed earlier

tuttupalveluvaarin.question: Your acquaintance complains that you did not act as you agreed earlier.
answers: You berate your acquaintance and you both move your belongings angrily
You say you are sorry and you move your belongings together

muutettu.question: Everything has now been moved to the new apartment. What do you do?
answers: You unpack your belongings and deliver the moving boxes to where they belong
You leave your belongings in the boxes
You have already unpacked your belongings with your acquaintance
